mapper.select: select * from wtm_member_invited_record r WHERE r.memberId=#{memberId};

select m.imageUrl imageUrl,m.memberName memberName,s.memberScore,r.createTime invitedTime from wtm_member m LEFT JOIN wtm_member_invited_record r ON r.memberId=m.id LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score s ON s.memberId=m.id WHERE r.parentId=#{parentID} order by r.createTime desc

SELECT CASE WHEN sum(flow.flowScore) is null THEN 0 ELSE sum(flow.flowScore) END AS totalScore, (SELECT pointCount FROM wtm_member_task WHERE id=3) invitedScore, (SELECT invitedCode FROM wtm_member WHERE id=#{memberId}) invitedCode FROM wtm_member_score_flow flow LEFT JOIN wtm_member_score_flow_type t ON t.id = flow.typeId WHERE flow.memberId =#{memberId} AND t.id IN (10,18);

SELECT sum(h.flowScore) shareCounts, m.memberName memberName, m.imageUrl imageUrl FROM wtm_member_score_flow h LEFT JOIN wtm_member m ON h.memberId = m.id WHERE h.typeId IN (10, 18) GROUP BY h.memberId ORDER BY shareCounts DESC,m.createTime ASC LIMIT 10
